name: Smashy Smashy Block Block
description:
Introduction

Smash all the blocks as quickly as you can and see if you can beat your time. Good luck! You can also punch the animals, but that is just for fun.

Please post your times in the comment section.

Controls

If you get stuck on a level hit escape and press continue to start the level again.

Menu - Keyboard Escape

Left - Keyboard A /Keyboard left arrow/Left controller stick

Right- Keyboard D /Keyboard right arrow/Right controller stick

Jump - Keyboard spacebar/Right button controller

Punch - Keyboard enter/Left mouse button/Bottom button controller

Update log

Version 1.0.0.2:  You can now punch the chicken but it is optional.

Version 1.0.0.1:  Made the player jump variable and added a new level.

Version 1.0:  The first release of the game, only 5 levels so far but more to come.
